name: node-sale-fuse-l2.public.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: Runs the Avail light client with a valid license to participate in the Node Sale for Fuse L2 Flash (testnet) and Ember (mainnet).
description: Welcome to the Node Sale for Fuse L2! This DAppNode package enables you to run an Avail light client node, securing the zkEVM-powered Fuse Flash and Ember L2 networks. A total of 12,000 exclusive node licenses are available ahead of the Q2 2025 launch. If you're new to Avail & Fuse Node Sale, explore the [Avail light client documentation](https://docs.availproject.org/docs/operate-a-node/run-a-light-client/Overview), [API references](https://docs.availproject.org/api-reference/avail-lc-api), and [Node Sale details](https://www.fuse.io/node-sale) to get started.

exposable.name: Avail P2P WebRTC
exposable.description: P2P WebRTC endpoint for Avail node

exposable.name: Avail JSON RPC
exposable.description: JSON RPC endpoint for Avail node

author: Fuse Network <hello@fuse.io> (https://github.com/fuseio)
